head.title: Insight Pennsylvania Cyber Charter School | Online School Pennsylvania

meta.name: description
meta.content: Insight Academy of Pennsylvania helps students in grades K-12 reach their true potential. Learn how the Insight Academy of Pennsylvania prepares students for careers.
Insight Academy of Pennsylvania helps students in grades K-12 reach their true potential. Learn how the Insight Academy of Pennsylvania prepares students for careers.

div.span:
Enrollment for the 2020–2021 school year is now open!
Apply today>>

We’re accepting immediate enrollment for the current school year.
Enroll now!

Learn What You Can Do

Go>>

here.

div.p: We are now accepting enrollment applications for school years 2019–2020 and 2020–2021. Visit our "How to Enroll" pages to learn more.

img.alt: Photo of ISPA students at the Academy of NS
img.title: Photo of ISPA students at the Academy of NS

h2.a: Enrollment for the 2020–2021 School Year Is Open

div.p: We'd love to welcome your family to the ISPA community! Apply today.
Get a head start on college and career with relevant courses!
Good attendance helps students do well. Start Strong!
ILPs target each student's strengths and weaknesses.

h2.a: What to Expect with Online Schooling

div.p: Curious how online schooling works? Watch these videos to find out.

img.alt: Zac, Elayna, and Paola, three K12 students
img.title: Zac, Elayna, and Paola, three K12 students

p.style: font-family: tahoma, arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12px;

div.p: Through videos, images, and timelines, see an average day in the lives of three very different K12 students.
Network your way to the college and career options you want!
A panel discussion with teachers from K12-powered schools. Discover more!
Find out how you can join the ISPA team and compete in their Esports League.

h5.strong: Learn what makes ISPA unique from CEO Eileen Cannistraci.

div.p: Insight PA Cyber Charter School is an online public school for independent learners who love an academic challenge. Our educators are dedicated to inspiring and empowering students through an education experience tailored to each child's needs.

We're now enrolling students in grades K–12 for the 2019–2020 school year. We also offer the Destinations Career Academy, which gives high school students the opportunity to explore career options and gain an edge for the future. And we provide students across the Commonwealth the opportunity to learn in the ways that are right for them with:

ul.li: A rigorous, interactive curriculum from K12, a leading provider of K–12 online learning and an AdvancED-accredited company
A career exploratory course for middle school students
Destinations Career Academy for high school students

em.br: Families do not pay tuition for a student to attend an online public school. Common household items and office supplies like printer ink and paper are not provided. Our enrollment consultants can help address your technological and computer questions and needs.

div.p: Copyright © 2020 Insight PA Cyber Charter School. All rights reserved.
